entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Escoumins

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this evening. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. A few flurries or rain showers beginning in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
